00063 template <class Interface>
00064 TReferenceMember<Interface>::TReferenceMember()
00065 :      m_definitionComponentPtr(NULL), m_componentPtr(NULL), m_isInitialized(false)
00066 {
00067 }
00068 
00069 
00070 template <class Interface>
00071 void TReferenceMember<Interface>::Init(const IComponent* ownerPtr, const IRealAttributeStaticInfo& staticInfo)
00072 {
00073        BaseClass::Init(ownerPtr, staticInfo, &m_definitionComponentPtr);
00074 
00075        m_componentPtr = NULL;
00076 }
00077 
00078 
00079 template <class Interface>
00080 bool TReferenceMember<Interface>::IsValid() const
00081 {
00082        return EnsureInitialized();
00083 }
00084 
00085 
00086 
00087 template <class Interface>
00088 Interface* TReferenceMember<Interface>::GetPtr() const
00089 {
00090        EnsureInitialized();
00091 
00092        return m_componentPtr;
00093 }
00094 
00095 
00096 template <class Interface>
00097 Interface* TReferenceMember<Interface>::operator->() const
00098 {
00099        EnsureInitialized();
00100        I_ASSERT(m_componentPtr != NULL);
00101 
00102        return GetPtr();
00103 }

00108 template <class Interface>
00109 TReferenceMember<Interface>::TReferenceMember(const TReferenceMember& ptr)
00110 :      BaseClass(ptr),
00111        m_definitionComponentPtr(ptr.m_definitionComponentPtr),
00112        m_componentPtr(ptr.m_componentPtr),
00113        m_isInitialized(ptr.m_isInitialized)

00115 }

00117 
00118 template <class Interface>
00119 bool TReferenceMember<Interface>::EnsureInitialized() const
00120 {
00121        if (!m_isInitialized && (m_definitionComponentPtr != NULL) && BaseClass::IsValid()){
00122               const ICompositeComponent* parentPtr = m_definitionComponentPtr->GetParentComponent();
00123               if (parentPtr != NULL){
00124                      const QByteArray& componentId = BaseClass::operator*();
00125 
00126                      QByteArray baseId;
00127                      QByteArray subId;
00128                      BaseClass2::SplitId(componentId, baseId, subId);
00129 
00130                      IComponent* componentPtr = parentPtr->GetSubcomponent(baseId);
00131                      if (componentPtr != NULL){
00132                             m_componentPtr = BaseClass2::ExtractInterface<Interface>(componentPtr, subId);
00133                      }
00134 
00135                      m_isInitialized = true;
00136               }
00137               else{
00138                      qCritical("Component %s is defined, but definition component has no parent", BaseClass::operator*().constData());
00139               }
00140        }
00141 
00142        return (m_componentPtr != NULL);
00143 }
